com.jacob.com
Class InvocationProxy

java.lang.Object
  com.jacob.com.InvocationProxy
public class InvocationProxy
extends Object

Version:
$Id: InvocationProxy.html,v 1.1 2005/12/19 16:41:26 lahous Exp $
Author:
joe DispatchProxy wraps this class around any event handlers before making the JNI call that sets up the link with EventProxy. This means that EventProxy just calls invoke(String,Variant[]) against the instance of this class. Then this class does reflection against the event listener to call the actual event methods. All Event methods have the signature void eventMethodName(Variant[])

Constructor Summary
protected InvocationProxy()
          dummy constructor for subclasses that don't actually wrap anything and just want to override the invoke() method
protected InvocationProxy(Object pTargetObject)
          Constructs an invocation proxy that fronts for an event listener.

InvocationProxy

protected InvocationProxy(Object pTargetObject)
Constructs an invocation proxy that fronts for an event listener. The InvocationProxy will wrap the target object and forward any received messages to the wrapped object

Parameters:
pTargetObject -
